com.artisans.code.movimento1euro.fragments

Class ViewLastCausesFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.artisans.code.movimento1euro.fragments.CauseListFragment
        • com.artisans.code.movimento1euro.fragments.ViewLastCausesFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ViewLastCausesFragment
extends CauseListFragment
    Fragment for the list that shows the past causes A simple Fragment subclass. Activities that contain this fragment must implement the ViewLastCausesFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener interface to handle interaction events. Use the newInstance(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) factory method to create an instance of this fragment.

        public static final int START_YEAR

        Specified by:
